description.raw:
Due to the force control on the MPL arm in HaptixControlPlugin, the sim API call `hxs_set_model_transform` does not have a lasting effect on the arm (it snaps back to the previous position before the command). We've received a lot of feedback from teams that they'd like to the ability to place the arm in an arbitrary pose using the sim API. This quick pull request publishes to the same ignition transport topic that commands the arm pose via keyboard control when the arm model is chosen in `hxs_set_model_transform`.

To test, I recommend using the Octave API. See me or Brian if you need help getting set up with that. You could also use the C example in [haptix-comm PR 76](#!/osrf/haptix-comm/pull-request/76).
